publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5370 Stewart Maxwell: Top of the Lollipops—That the Parliament congratulates John Foley, the newly crowned Lollipop Person of the Year 2009, who patrols the crossing at Bushes Primary School in Paisley; notes the efforts of the pupils and parents in seeing John nominated, with their rendition of The Proclaimers’ I’m Gonna Be (500 Miles); considers Mr Foley’s enthusiasm to be a model of excellence for all lollipop men and women across the country, and further notes that the pupils plan to spend the cash prize on creating a community garden in the school with John as Head Gardener. Supported by: Jamie McGrigor*, Bob Doris*, Alasdair Allan*, Bill Kidd*, Jim Tolson*, Ms Wendy Alexander*, Brian Adam*, Ross Finnie*, Robin Harper*, Bill Wilson*, Stuart McMillan*, Rob Gibson*
S3M-5370 Top of the Lollipops (lodged on 8 December 2009) Jamie Hepburn*, Aileen Campbell*, Anne McLaughlin*, Gil Paterson*, Hugh Henry*, Jack McConnell*
S3M-5370 Top of the Lollipops (lodged on 8 December 2009) Sandra White*

S3M-5370 Stewart Maxwell: Top of the Lollipops—That the Parliament congratulates John Foley, the newly crowned Lollipop Person of the Year 2009, who patrols the crossing at Bushes Primary School in Paisley; notes the efforts of the pupils and parents in seeing John nominated, with their rendition of The Proclaimers’ I’m Gonna Be (500 Miles); considers Mr Foley’s enthusiasm to be a model of excellence for all lollipop men and women across the country, and further notes that the pupils plan to spend the cash prize on creating a community garden in the school with John as Head Gardener. Supported by: Jamie McGrigor, Bob Doris, Alasdair Allan, Bill Kidd, Jim Tolson, Ms Wendy Alexander, Brian Adam, Ross Finnie, Robin Harper, Bill Wilson, Stuart McMillan, Rob Gibson, Jamie Hepburn, Aileen Campbell, Anne McLaughlin, Gil Paterson, Hugh Henry, Jack McConnell, Sandra White
S3M-5370 Top of the Lollipops (lodged on 8 December 2009) Angela Constance*
S3M-5370 Top of the Lollipops (lodged on 8 December 2009) Maureen Watt*
